element.name: "The Sack" by Windsockers, Multi-cache (1.5/1)

long-description.p: The Black & Tans were a regiment of the british army stationed at Gormonston and were known for their ferocity. At the "Medical Centre" which was originally Derhams pub but was gutted by the Black & Tans.The pub is at the bottom of Clonard street and it was this street that was virtually destroyed in what was to become known as "The Sack of Balbriggan".
At the bridge over the "Bracken" river there is a commerative plaque to Seamus Lawless and Sean Gibbons. They were shot near this spot by the "Black & Tans".

To find the cache take note of the date at the above location call this date A.B.C.D.E.F.G
The cache can be found at N 53° 36.(A+F)A(A+F) W 006° 11.G(C-D)(E-(A+F))

The Cache is a micro container.
Please take care and rehide the cache to prevent muggles from discovering its location.

element.additional-waypoints:
FN20WCE - Final
N/S __ 째 __ . ___ W/E ___ 째 __ . ___

ul.li:
2010-05-16T19:00:00Z : Found it by Alastair74
Found with Wildfowler on the way home from Dublin after a weekends caching.TFTC

2010-05-16T19:00:00Z : Found it by wildfowler
Found on the way home from a caching weekend around Dublin with Alastair74! Needed an extra hint with this one! [;)] TNLNSL TFTC

2010-05-11T19:00:00Z : Found it by medic143
A DNF and a find on the same cache in the same day. After my business was over went back to the site, went to where I thought it was, saw something as I approached and found the cache. Unreal. Emailed the cache order the coords from my sat nav at GZ, but accuracy on 8-9 metres.
TFTC

2010-05-11T19:00:00Z : Didn't find it by medic143
The coordinates put me in what I believe to be the same spot as some other logs mentioned. I believe I know where it's hidden (but taking coordinates for that spot gave no obvious maths area)and I didnt have the time or enthusiam for a finger tip search of what might not be the right location.
Am going to email my calcs to the owner for verification before searching.

2010-04-24T19:00:00Z : Found it by Fjon
Found it today with a bit of help! Something odd about the co-ords here - they were pointing me in a different place today.

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: "The Sack"
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The Black & Tans were a regiment of the british army stationed at Gormonston and were known for their ferocity. At the "Medical Centre" which was originally Derhams pub but was gutted by the Black & Tans.The pub is at the bottom of Clonard street and it was this street that was virtually destroyed in what was to become known as "The Sack of Balbriggan".

At the bridge over the "Bracken" river there is a commerative plaque to Seamus Lawless and Sean Gibbons. They were shot near this spot by the "Black & Tans".

The Cache

To find the cache take note of the date at the above location call this date A.B.C.D.E.F.G
The cache can be found at N 53° 36.(A+F)A(A+F) W 006° 11.G(C-D)(E-(A+F))

The Cache is a micro container.
Please take care and rehide the cache to prevent muggles from discovering its location.







The Windsockers

The coordinates put me in what I believe to be the same spot as some other logs mentioned. I believe I know where it's hidden (but taking coordinates for that spot gave no obvious maths area)and I didnt have the time or enthusiam for a finger tip search of what might not be the right location.
